name: Aubergine and Goat Cheese
instructions: Chop the onions, lightly fry them in a pot in olive oil. Add Quinoa, water and a pinch of Himalayan salt, cook until the quinoa is done.
instructions-extended:
In the meantime
Chop the aubergine and fry it in olive oil with a sprinkle of Himalayan salt. Slice the goat cheese.

Serve the dish with black pepper and Himalayan salt
